case.title: HONEST MAN TO START LOVELY FAMILY WITH. - 33 (London)
case.text:
Am a single black lady living and working in Lambeth down to earth no children but am ready for it now, am good looking but not slime type and not very big just a cuddling body with a good heart, 5"6 tall, am loving caring and respectful. Am tired of boring single life I want to meet a nice responsible friendly man.
Tired of the boring single life! Well if you are single/widow/divorce with no kids and now you are really looking forward to start a family! fine you have me than, but you must not smoke/do drug/ arrogant/lazy/ no pet.
If you love kids and you really want to start family pls reply I prefer mature Christian white man 34-55 years sorry I can't date anyone younger than me so don't waste your time replying to my advert and if you do I won't reply. Let go for a drink or cinema and have a chat and see if we click. xx
